sourceName: A compilation of planktonic foraminifera assemblage composition for the Last Glacial Maximum
bibtex: @article{jonkers2024forcens-lgm,|-&-| author = {Jonkers, Lukas and Mix, Alan and Voelker, Antje and Risebrobakken, Bj{\o}rg and Smart, Christopher W and Ivanova, Elena and Arellano-Torres, Elsa and Eynaud, Fr{\'e}d{\'e}rique and Naoufel, Haddam and Max, Lars and others},|-&-| journal = {Scientific Data},|-&-| number = {1},|-&-| pages = {361},|-&-| publisher = {Nature Publishing Group UK London},|-&-| title = {ForCenS-LGM: a dataset of planktonic foraminifera species assemblage composition for the Last Glacial Maximum},|-&-| volume = {11},|-&-| year = {2024}|-&-|}|-&-||&|@misc{jonkers2024forcens-lgm,|-&-| abstract = {This is an update of and extension of the MARGO compilation of planktonic foraminifera assemblages for the Last Glacial Maximum (19,000-23,000 ka BP). It includes all data previously compiled within the MARGO project, with some minor corrections (indicated in QCNote), data published since and new counts. The taxonomy has been updated and harmonised to be directly comparable with the ForCenS core top data set (https://doi.pangaea.de/10.1594/PANGAEA.873570; https://doi.org/10.1038/sdata.2017.109). Criteria for inclusion of new data followed those of MARGO, including the ranking of chronological confidence (https://doi.org/10.1016/j.quascirev.2004.07.017). All data pertain to the size fraction >150 $\mathrm{\mu}$m. Absolute counts are provided whenever these were available; no attempt has been made to correct published relative abundance data when their sum deviated from unity. The data are made available in wide format with metadata with self-explainable headers.},|-&-| author = {Lukas {Jonkers} and Alan C {Mix} and Antje H L {Voelker} and Bj{\o}rg {Risebrobakken} and Christopher W {Smart} and Elena V {Ivanova} and Elsa {Arellano-Torres} and Fr\'{e}d\'{e}rique {Eynaud} and Haddam {Naoufel} and Lars {Max} and Linda {Rossignol} and Margit H {Simon} and Maria Virg\'{\i}nia {Alves Martins} and Sandro Monticelli {Petr\'{o}} and Thibaut {Caley} and Trond {Dokken} and William R {Howard} and Michal {Kucera}},|-&-| doi = {10.1594/PANGAEA.962852},|-&-| publisher = {PANGAEA},|-&-| title = {{ForCenS-LGM {\textendash} a compilation of planktonic foraminifera assemblage composition for the Last Glacial Maximum}},|-&-| type = {dataset},|-&-| url = {https://doi.org/10.1594/PANGAEA.962852},|-&-| year = {2024}|-&-|}|-&-|
text: Jonkers, L., Mix, A., Voelker, A., Risebrobakken, B., Smart, C. W., Ivanova, E., Arellano-Torres, E., Eynaud, F., Naoufel, H., Max, L., & others. (2024).
